text: there's a reason why 99% of my videos
are about travel culture and experiences
not politics because truthfully I hate
politics
I realize that hate is a strong word I
hardly ever use it unless I'm really
trying to emphasize my dislike for
something which is why I'm using it
right now I hate politics because it
produces negativity politics separates
people it divides families just look
what's going on right now in my country
my grandma and my dad have complete
opposite views one is far left and the
other is far right and they can never
talk about politics without screaming at
each other I am one of the most positive
and optimistic people you will ever meet
and that's why politics makes me sick it
gives me a headache it puts me in a bad
mood when is the last time you check the
news and heard something positive
happening it's almost like we were
trapped in a world of negative
consumption our Facebook feeds are
slammed with Trump this Trump that North
Korea Putin Iran Israel Palestine Syria
it drives me crazy all politicians
regardless of which country are obsessed
with power and money every single one of
them is corrupt greedy and frankly a
liar to me politics is like two people
beating each other up instead of
volunteering at a nursing home and the
biggest problem with social media these
days is that it's given everyone a voice
15 years ago the only voice is made
public or from qualified journalists TV
reporters etc now it's Joe Schmo on his
couch at 3 a.m. trolling you from his
basement while eating Cheetos I realized
a contrary argument about politics that
they are essential for understanding how
the world works how economies run and
how people can live safely in their
countries politics is an important part
of our democratic society but I just
really wish that they could revolve
around the positive things
in today's world which makes up the vast
majority of human life but that's just
not the case all politicians do is
criticize each other find every little
negative thing to say about what the
other is doing or saying and sometimes I
wonder how they can get anything done
because they never seem to agree so
that's why I choose not to talk about
politics this page is about travel
there's enough people on social media
who focus on politics and I am NOT going
to be the next I'm drew pinsky and if
you like my travel videos please click
Subscribe and join me as I plan to visit
every country in the world
